titles.title: Action Heroine Cheer Fruits
アクションヒロイン チアフルーツ
Action Heroine Cheer Fruits
액션 히로인 치어후르츠
动作女主 水果应援团

anime.description: The local heroine fighter of a certain city became popular and a national star. Because of this, local heroines debuted in various other places, and their action live events became a hit trend nationally. The Hinano City is a tranquil area that cultivates fruits, but has lost its vitality. For the town she loves, high school girl http://anidb.net/ch88377 [Shirogane Misaki] and other girls become local heroines (at the urging of Misaki`s aunt, the prefectural governor) and vow to produce action live events. The teen story depicts their strenuous efforts to revitalize their town. Source: ANN Note: The first episode received an early screening at a special event held at Shirogane Takanawa Selene b2 in Tokyo on 02.07.2017.

externalentity.identifier: アクションヒロイン_チアフルーツ

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: sentai
tag.description: In Japanese, sentai is a military unit, and may be translated as "squadron", "task force", "group" or "wing". In the anime fandom, however, it usually refers to the Super Sentai Series, a long-running superhero team franchise of http://anidb.net/t5000 [tokusatsu] shows featuring live action characters and colorful special effects, and other similar shows. A prominent characteristic of such shows is that the colour- and elemental-coded heroes, usually numbering around five or more, fight to save the world from the evil that terrorizes the area, which may even span the entire universe.

tag.name: TO BE MOVED TO CHARACTER
tag.description: Tags under this parent tag are going to be moved to character tags and removed from the anime they`re currently assigned to. They will be blocked from the anime system once that move is complete. Please help with that job if you know what characters they should be assigned to.

episode.title: ゼロから始めるアクションヒロイン
An Action Heroine Who Starts from Zero
Une héroïne toute neuve
제로에서 시작하는 액션 히로인
Zero kara Hajimeru Action Heroine
episode.summary: The action heroines are facing a possible infringement lawsuit, so they`ll have to build original heroines from scratch. What concept will represent their small town best? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大暇人カノン
A Very Idle Kanon
Kanon, reine des glandeuses
카논은 한가해
Dai Himajin Kanon
episode.summary: Kanon demands to know why Ann quit the rhythmic gymnastics team. Unsatisfied with her answer, Kanon challenges An to a competition. Why is Kanon so determined to fight her? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 普通の【ろこ】がヒロインやってみてもいいんだけど
It`s Okay for a Normal "Roko" to Try to Become a Heroine
Roko devient une héroïne !
평범한 로코가 히로인 해도 돼
Futsuu no "Roko" ga Heroine Yatte Mite mo Iindakedo
episode.summary: Misaki asks Mikan and Ann to become the action heroines of Hinano City! While they get acquainted with the other girls on the Heroine Team, another girl preps for her moment. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いきなり超天界!
Suddenly, Ultra-Celestial!
Divine surprise !
갑자기 초천계!
Ikinari Chou Tenkai!
episode.summary: The heroine Kamidaio`s performance is cancelled! In an effort to make her sister`s dream come true, Mikan approaches Ann in hopes of making a Kamidaio appearance happen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 青山妹, 演出はじめるってよ
Little Sis Aoyama Says She`ll Start Directing
Genki sur le devant de la scène
아오야마 동생이 연출을 하겠대
Aoyama Imouto, Enshutsu Hajimerutte yo
episode.summary: Mikan is past her deadline to write new material, so she suggests a trip to beach for inspiration. However, is her place in the Cheer Fruits on the line? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: がんばれ!! ミカピョン
Good Luck!! Mikapyon
Courage, Mikannette !
힘내라 미카푱
Ganbare!! Mika-pyon
episode.summary: The Cheer Fruits` determination to save their town grows even stronger. Meanwhile, Mikan faces a challenge that may require more resolve than ever. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 爆発天使はつりちゃん
Explosion Angel Hatsuri-chan
Hatsuri, l`ange explosif !
폭발 천사 하츠리
Bakuhatsu Tenshi Hatsuri-chan
episode.summary: A "Whimsical Angel" makes an appearance, or is she an "Explosion Angel?" The Cheer Fruits try to decide what to do with their newest excited interloper. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぷろじぇくと・ぶる~
Project Blue
Project Blue
프로젝트 블루
Project Blue
episode.summary: Genki`s twin sister Yuki is the singer Cheer Fruits needs, but Yuki`s past as a failed idol has made her too paranoid to perform. Can they help her overcome her fears? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 情熱☆フルーツ
Passion Fruits
정열☆후르츠
Jounetsu Fruits
episode.summary: The girls are preparing for their largest stage yet and Misaki is still nowhere to be seen. With so much on the line, they can`t afford to make mistakes now. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 城ヶ根御前の憂鬱
The Misery of Misaki Shirogane
La mélancolie de Misaki Shirogane
시로가네 미사키의 우울
Shirogane Misaki no Yuuutsu
episode.summary: As the girls practice to perform the newest show, lingering apprehensions loom in Misaki`s mind. Things only get worse when Misaki suddenly disappears. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さよなら絶望戦士
So Long, Hopeless Warriors
Sayonara héroïne désespoir
안녕, 절망전사
Sayonara Zetsubou Senshi
episode.summary: Cheer Fruits` popularity begins to soar! They even get a visit from Ann`s hero: Kamidaio herself! After the encounter, though, something changes in Ann... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白銀[ぎん)]の本気[マジ] ~Silver Serious~
Gin no Maji: Silver Serious
Silver Serious
은빛 진심 ~Silver Serious~
Gin no Maji: Silver Serious
episode.summary: A dark memory hangs over Misaki as the girls prep for that night`s special performance. When things go wrong on stage, a little improv may be required to save the show. Source: crunchyroll
